name: Sango (Shango)
shortLoreBlurb: Sango (Shango) is a deity from Yoruba associated with thunder, justice. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings.
overlapsLinks: Athena (Greek), Indra (Vedic), Karttikeya (Hindu), Morrigan (Celtic), Perun (Slavic), Sekhmet (Egyptian), Thor (Norse), Zeus (Greek)
description: Sango (Shango) is a deity from Yoruba associated with thunder, justice. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings.
